column1: The Pit Room////In that Killen's is actually in Pearland
column2: this or Gatlin's is the best in the city limits. Bram hits home runs with his brisket
column5: and his sides are always on point. The old school sour cherry pie is great and the sweet tea and lemonade are always spot on. The in-house pickling of carrots
column8: and cucumbers is a nice addition as well. The tortillas made from rendered brisket fat are a piece of heaven. Bram even gets upgraded white bread for those who love their BBQ in a slice of white bread as I do.
